entries.title_d: The whole operation to this point has been a distraction so that the Cloak leader could pass through the system while CorSec's attention was elsewhere. You must hurry and intercept him before he can hyperspace out.
entries.title: Corellia System: Destroy the Cloak Leader
entries.quest_target_d: You must intercept the Cloak leader and ensure his destruction. You must not allow him to hyperspace out of the system.
entries.quest_location_d: The Cloak leader must not be allowed to escape. You should not leave the Corellia system until this mission is complete.
entries.quest_escort_d: All Cloak ships flying with the leader must be destroyed.
entries.failed_escape: The commander is not going to be pleased that you let the Cloak leader escape. Return to the station for debriefing.
entries.escort_wiped_out: \#pcontrast1 Tactical Computer: <\#pcontrast3  All secondary targets destroyed.\#pcontrast1 >
entries.escort_remaining: \#pcontrast1 Tactical Computer: <\#pcontrast3  Secondary target destroyed. %DI escort ships remaining.\#pcontrast1 >
entries.destroy_escort: Copy that. The Cloak leader is destroyed. Now take out the remaining escort craft.
entries.assassinate_success: Excellent work, pilot. The Cloak leader and his escort has been destroyed. Return to the station for debriefing.
entries.arrival_phase_2: We've plotted the Cloak leader's projected course. Intercept and destroy him. And hurry.
entries.arrival_phase_1: Listen up, pilot. This whole operation may have just been a distraction. The Cloak leader is passing through the system as we speak. Stand by.
